position_details: Designed and implemented a fully-integrated WebRTC video conferencing platform that enables real-time video, audio, and messaging communication between users.
Collaborated with a team of developers to create a user-friendly interface and ensure smooth functionality of the platform.
Improved the platform's performance and scalability by optimizing its architecture and integrating advanced features such as screen sharing and recording capabilities.
Worked on building and maintaining the institute's website
Made several API endpoints for the frontend
Made responsive layouts on the frontend and consumed REST api from backend
Worked with a team to make a collaborative workspace for educators and students
Made several restful APIs for android application
